subject: Medications for US residents
body:
Dear customer.
Is it safe to shop for drugs on the Web? How to save some money on the medications you use? In what ways are Canadian drugs better than American ones? Get answers to all these questions now.
CanadianPharmacy warns you about the growing threat of drug poisoning caused by low-quality medications sold by underground online pharmacies without a license. Choose the best and save on it purchase real generic medications from licensed manufacturers at CanadianPharmacy. Our prices will please you.
CanadianPharmacy no one is able to match our prices for generic medications neither in Canada nor in the USA.
Yours faithfully,Derek Patton
